assumptions: Current production operates within Arkansas cottage food law limits
No commercial kitchen lease currently active
Operator attends at least one farmers market per week
Product quality is not the primary constraint (assumed from problem statement framing)
Operator can commit 2-3 hours/week to subscription management in addition to baking
No significant capital injection planned within 90-day window

interventions.name: Pre-order subscription system
actions: Design 2-3 weekly box configurations with fixed pricing
Create order capture system (Google Forms or Square free tier)
Place physical sign-up at market table next market day
